nodes.bodyText: Since we no longer use ExtImpRubicon as a type for map keys, we should rename the map to something like impToImpExt. Please correct other cases as well.
Please remove an extra blank line after last variable declaration. There should be an empty line after last symbol in each .java class, which in 99% cases is a closing curly bracket of the class.

This annotation is redundant, since if it is missing Jason will resolve camel case naming (typical Java variable name) into snake case - which is going to be exactly is_rewarded_inventory. So you can skip the annotation when variable name is resolved as expected .json property name.

Please add a //given inline commentary for a block of test where you declare variables or set up stubs.
Check other missing cases. Thanks!
Please, inline this variable since it is needed only for video impression.

This seems like a hack. What if you'll need to add another field?
Please, use @Builder instead of @AllArgsConstructor.
PS. Usually, we use builder for models having more then 3 fields.

nodes.bodyText:
No need for separate enum since we have only one value so far.
Please, use plaing rewarded string where needed.
Pls, make it final to be in one-style.
The line is too long, pls use formatting in your IDE.

Minor. For better readability maybe it make sense to split ExtPrebid ext into 2 separate arguments: ExtImpPrebid extImpPrebid and ExtImpRubicon extImpRubicon.
What do you think?
Minor. Redundant carriage return. Just to be in one style with other code.
